# Inactive: Language Specialists

These agents live in `inactive/agents/` and can be activated by moving them into `agents/`.

[‚Üê Back to Inactive Agent Library](inactive-library.html)

| Agent | Category | Model | Summary |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `bash-expert` | language-specialists | sonnet | Defensive Bash scripting expert for automation, CI/CD, and system utilities. |
| `flask-expert` | language-specialists | sonnet | Flask framework specialist for Python APIs, WSGI deployments, and testing. |
| `golang-pro` | language-specialists | sonnet | Crafts idiomatic, concurrent Go with robust error handling and performance profiling. |
| `javascript-pro` | language-specialists | sonnet | JavaScript specialist focused on modern ESNext patterns, async architectures, and runtime performance across browser and Node.js. |
| `nodejs-expert` | language-specialists | sonnet | Node.js backend specialist for services, tooling, and runtime optimization. |
| `python-pro` | language-specialists | sonnet | Production-grade Python engineer for performant, testable, and secure codebases. |
| `react-specialist` | language-specialists | sonnet | React 18+ specialist delivering scalable component architecture, performance tuning, and modern ecosystem integration. |
| `rust-pro` | language-specialists | sonnet | Builds idiomatic, performant Rust with strong ownership models, async, and safe concurrency. |
| `tailwind-expert` | language-specialists | sonnet | Tailwind CSS specialist for utility-first design systems and styling. |
| `typescript-pro` | language-specialists | sonnet | TypeScript specialist for strict typing, DX optimization, and enterprise-scale architecture. |
